title: Garden Seen From Above

thumbnail.alt_text: A work made of oil on tan cardboard.

inscriptions: Signed recto, upper left, in brush and black oil paint: "E. Vuillard"
credit_line: Gift of Dorothy Braude Edinburg to the Harry B. and Bessie K. Braude Memorial Collection
publication_history:
Guy Cogeval and Antoine Saloman, Vuillard, The Inexhaustible Glance: Critical Catalogue of Painting and Pastels, vol. 2 (Milan: Skira/Wildenstein Institute, 2003), p. 594, no. VII-105.

Suzanne Folds McCullagh (ed.), Drawings in Dialogue: Old Master Through Modern, The Harry B. and Bessie K. Braude Memorial Collection, exh. cat. (Chicago: The Art Institute of Chicago, 2006), p. 139, cat. 98 (ill.).
exhibition_history:
Paris, Bernheim-Jeune, "Oeuvres de Bonnard, …Vuillard," Apr. 2–22, 1900.

Kumamoto Museum of Art, "Vuillard," Nov. 18–Dec. 4, 1977, cat. 23; also the Ohita Museum of Art, Dec. 10, 1977–Jan. 8, 1978, and the Shimonoseki-Daimaru, Jan. 12–24, 1978.

Lausanne, Paul Vallotton, "Un ensemble d’huiles de maîtres suisses et français du XIXe et XXe siècle," Dec. 6, 1979–Jan. 16, 1980.

London, J. P. L. Fine Arts, "Bonnard, Roussel, Vuillard," Spring 1981.

London, J. P. L. Fine Arts, "Edouard Vuillard (1868-1940): Paintings, Pastels, and Drawings," Jan. 30-Apr. 4, 1985, cat. 5.

Salzburg, Galerie Salis, "Bonnard, Vuillard," July 24–Sept. 15, 1985, cat. 22.

London, J. P. L. Fine Arts, "Private View: A Selection of Impressionist and Post-Impressionist Drawings, Watercolours, Pastels, and Paintings, Nineteenth and Twentieth Century French Sculpture," Nov. 23, 1988-Jan. 27, 1989, cat. 39.

Art Institute of Chicago, "Drawings in Dialogue: Old Master Through Modern, The Harry B. and Bessie K. Braude Memorial Collection," June 3–July 30, 2006, p. 139, cat. 98 (ill.).
provenance_text: Galerie Druet, Paris.  Paul Vallotton, Lausanne, by Dec. 1979.  J. P. L. Fine Art, London, by 1981.  Sold, Christie’s, London, Nov. 27, 1989, lot 20, to Dorothy Braude Edinburg, Brookline, MA; given to the Art Institute of Chicago, 2013.
